services.name: Environmental Assessments and Geology
services.description: BES, IEE, EIA, SIA, SEA, Environmental Auditing, MP preparation, Geological and Geo hazard Assessments.

services.name: Engineering and Infrastructure
services.description: Detail Project Report and Detailed Architectural Drawings, Detailed Cost Estimate and BoQ preparation, Transport Management Plan.

services.name: Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Planning
services.description: Nature Based Solution Study and Assessments, Climate Resilience Planning , LAPA, LDCRP, Vulnerability and Adaptation Assessment, Capacity Building.

services.name: Monitoring and Evaluation
services.description: Baseline, Midline, End line survey , Outcome Assessment and Evaluation.

services.name: Development Planning
services.description: Tourism Development Plan, Periodic Development Plan, Water Use Master Plan, Solid Waste Assessment and Management Plan, WASH Plans, Local level Plans focusing on LISA guideline of MoFAGA, RSLUP.

services.name: GIS and RS and ICT
services.description: GIS and RS based Spatial Plan, Overall Spatial Mapping and Analysis, Digital Profile and Planning

services.name: Biodiversity and Ecosystem
services.description: Human wildlife Conflict study, Wildlife Assessments and Management Plan, habitat Suitability assessment, Training and capacity building on wildlife crime and conflict management

services.name: GEDSI Assessment and Planning
services.description: GEDSI assessment and planning refer to processes aimed at ensuring that programs, projects, or services are inclusive and address the needs of diverse groups
